DOC.brief_summary: Patellofemoral pain syndrome ( PFPS ) common knee disorder affect physically active people . Despite grow base support early introduction hip strengthen exercise rehabilitation PFPS , randomize clinical trial compare isolated hip isolated quadriceps strengthen . The purpose study determine different exercise affect pain , strength , muscle activity , function female subject patellofemoral pain . The researcher hypothesize female diagnose PFPS initially participate hip strengthen program report great perceive level function , great strength , less pain , improve neuromuscular activity participate progressive quadriceps strengthen intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Rehabilitation Programs Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : Thirty-three female PFPS perform either initial hip strengthening ( hip group ) initial quadriceps strengthen ( quad group ) 4 week , prior 4 week similar program functional weight-bearing exercise . Self-reported pain , function , functional strength measure . Isometric strength assess hip abductor , external rotators , knee extensor . A mixed-model analysis variance use determine group difference time .
DOC.criteria: anterior retropatellar knee pain report least 2 follow activity : ascend descend stair , hop running , squatting , kneeling , prolong sit insidious onset symptom relate trauma pain compression patella pain palpation patellar facet symptoms present less one month clinical evidence knee pathology history recent knee surgery within past one year history patellar dislocation subluxation current significant injury affect low extremity joint
